attributes.action: Bring back the BCG to protect our children against rising levels of TB.
attributes.additional_details: He contracted it at Teign School, Kingsteignton Devon. Many other schools in Britain have had outbreaks in recent years. It is a terrible disease that can and will kill.
attributes.background: My son caught it at his school along with over 200 others, he is ok but many were made very ill and will suffer long term because of this. We almost wiped it out before so we can do it again.
